newsitem.headline: TABLE - Ameritech Corp Q2 oper net up.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Including an $87 million or $0.16 a share one-time charge for workforce restructuring at its overseas investments, Ameritech reported Q2 1997 net earnings of $537 million or $0.97 a share.
NOTE: Q2 1997 oper EPS grew 10.8 percent vs Q2 1996, and oper net grew 10.8 percent.
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Including the one-time charge, Ameritech reported six months 1997 net income of $1.073 billion, or $1.95 a share.
NOTE: According to First Call, the consensus of analysts' second quarter 1997 estimates for oper EPS was $1.12 a share, and the range of estimates was $1.10 to $1.13.
